body_content.explanation: someone who takes part in races on roads, especially on a bicycle or motorcycle:
examples: She builds bikes for all kinds of women, from those who want a trusty, comfortable city bike to hardcore road racers.
A top motorcycle road racer was on a life-support machine last night after crashing in a race on Sunday.

body_content.explanation: a bicycle, motorcycle, or car designed for riding fast on roads:
examples: There's nothing lightweight about these road racers other than their carbon-fibre frames.
Production of the red-and-black road racer, hand built in Italy, was limited to 60.
